episodes.title: LET GLORY SHINE: Cults Uncovered - Martha Glory Kartaoui Answers the Questions You're Afraid to Ask
episodes.description:
Let Glory Shine | Cults Uncovered: Martha Glory Kartaoui Answers the Questions You’re Afraid to Ask

In this eye-opening episode of Let Glory Shine, host Martha Kartaoui tackles the most pressing and misunderstood questions about cults, not just from her own experience as a survivor, but to bring clarity, truth, and healing to others who may be questioning their own reality.

What is a cult, really?
How do smart, capable people end up in one?
What are the signs that you might be in a cult — even a “spiritual” one?
And if you are… how do you get out?

Martha holds nothing back as she breaks the silence around manipulation, mind control, spiritual abuse, and the slow erosion of identity. Whether you're in it, came out of it, or know someone who might be trapped, this episode is a must-watch.

You’re not crazy. You’re not alone. And yes, there is a way out. Let this episode be the light that guides you.

#LetGloryShine #MarthaKartaoui #CultAwareness #SpiritualAbuse #HealingFromManipulation #FaithAndFreedom #ProsperaTV
subjects: Samanta Roy Institute of Science and Technology
